title: Police Tickets | 1 of 2
question_text:
A local police officer gives out between $1$ and $6\text{ tickets a day}$, the probability distribution table of which is shown above, where $X$ is the number of tickets handed out on any given day.
What is the probability the officer gives out at least $4\text{ tickets}$ on any given day?
tables:

solution:
The probability of at least $4\text{ tickets}$ can be found by adding up the following events of getting $4, 5,$ or $6\text{ tickets}$:

$$P\text{(at least 4)} = P(4)+P(5)+P(6) $$

$$= 0.35+0.14+0.03$$

$$ = 0.52$$

Thus, the correct answer is Choice 'B'.
